# default_decision_strategy { #kimmdy.runmanager.default_decision_strategy }

`runmanager.default_decision_strategy(reaction_results)`

Rejection-Free Monte Carlo.
takes a list of ReactionResults and choses a recipe.

## Parameters

| Name              | Type   | Description                    | Default   |
|-------------------|--------|--------------------------------|-----------|
| `reaction_reults` |        | from which one will be choosen | required  |
